short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate Invoices complient with the Westminster Boating Base format. 
 Maintainor: @DanEllisScience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An automatic instructor logbook (cross synced with chrome devices logged in the same account) capable of generating monthly invoices in the required format for WBB. 

On the first use, head to the options page to update your name, NI number and to add your sessions / qualificaitons / pay rates. 

For the addition of sessions to the logbook, just click on the toolbar icon, and select the ADD tab.

To generate an invoice, click on the generate tab, select a month and click the button. A new loading page should load whilst the file is buffering, and then automatically closed as your file is saved in your latest downloads folder.
